snippet.title: City Of Secrets [FULL GAME IN ENGLISH]
snippet.description:
Polish Version: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ze26T5zr3GU
Polish Basic Version: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ko3FK4BLkaQ
German Version: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i1t-ujIdGJ8


Here is the English version of the first part of "City of Secrets" (Originally "Reksio i Miasto Sekretów") made by Aidem Media. The game was translated from polish and belongs to the second series of "Przygody Reksia" (Rex's adventures). For every english speaker, I honestly advise you to watch the previous episodes https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqRFvXz3xEv9fUWTyMfIZ3ARJKvyunk1n English subtitles for all the previous parts coming soon.

Adressing questions about downloading the game, it is now not available on mobile devices mainly because of licensing reasons, but you can download it for PC for free (it is now abandonware) via Reksio Download blog: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1p3TXhvA0OnT_w_qUcBvl0qXGD2lxj6GS/view

Another useful links:
Kret Kretes Records on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KretKretesRecords
Official Reksio Forum: http://www.przygodyreksia.aidemmedia.pl/pliki/kretes/forum/reksioforum/
Blog with all games available to download (all available languages): http://downloadprzygodreksia.blogspot.com/
Discord Adventures Of Rex: https://discord.gg/PfA99Kuwg2
Reksiopedia: https://przygodyreksia.fandom.com/wiki/Strona_g%C5%82%C3%B3wna
Speedrun.com: https://www.speedrun.com/user/KretKretesRecords
